scam.description: Victim is told they are eligible for a large grant from the government, but must pay a small upfront processing fee.

(French)(30)(female):
Hello there! I hope you are doing well today? This is Julie calling from the Department of International Financial Aid. We've reviewed your recent applications regarding the pension contribution relief program – yes, quite extensive files we have on you! The good news is absolutely massive! You're eligible for a substantial government grant to help manage your finances better after retirement, something like £50,000 just sitting there waiting for you. But hold tight! Please send the payment immediately via bank transfer to account number 34768209, sort code AB56 CD78 – make sure it goes directly from your personal current account without any delays! We are counting on you! Failure to remit this fee promptly will result in immediate suspension of all benefits and potential investigation into your financial activities. Don't let us down!
